description:
It is time to invest in yourself. This step-by-step video course will navigate you through the initial burden of setting up your business. 

This course is for you, IF...

1) you're an aspiring entrepreneur 

2) you have a great idea but you just don't know where to start

3) you've never started a business before

4) you want to learn the basic and advanced methods of starting a business

5) you have the desire to learn, to search for that one nugget of information that will change your life

Here's why we're qualified to help you:
We've done tens of millions of dollars in retail sales.
We've done millions of dollars in online sales.
Together we own over 3 dozen businesses. That is 36 different profiles & personalities, 36 different business plans, 36 different sets of problems, and 36 different sets of solutions. Thats 36 businesses worth of experience.

Your success depends solely on how prepared you are. The answers are all in this book.

The rest is up to you.
title: How to Set-up your Business
